title: #352: The Crumb
description:
James makes us hungry for really cheap cake on Vanderpump Rules, Top Chef returns, and Sheree may or may not be struggling with a bug spray addiction on Real Housewives of Atlanta. Enjoy! Subscribe at http://www.patreon.com/watchwhatcrappens for bonus episodes, ringtones, and live group video chat parties.

0 Crappens Mailbag and Clear the Ramona
30:43 Vanderpump Rules
1:35:00 Top Chef Charleston begins
